lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like-- Does that also have advantage, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah it is, because you're flanking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, ooh! 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Roll damage again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 points of damage in one round. Yasha doesn't mess around. That finishes your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord's up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Fjord is going to walk up. "I'm a warlock." First, he's going to do-- I don't think this is a concentration thing, it's a bonus action. He's going to do Hexblade's Curse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, you can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's pronounced--

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (exaggerated Texas drawl) Hexblade's Curse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So much fun to make fun of him when he's not here. I think, at some point, you may need another mustache.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I gain a bonus to damage rolls that equals my proficiency modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So an additional three damage per strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An additional three damage! I should have done this forever ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but now you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not a warlock! First attack, still with advantage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! You're not flanking with anybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's not. It's just Yasha and I.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So first attack with the falchion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two attacks there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, sorry. But I'll take it. Those first two attacks, 17 and 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So a d8 plus--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: d8 plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d8 plus seven on each attack, plus a d6 on each. So roll that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same, 13 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! Starting to look pretty rough now, as parts of it are breaking down a bit. It's shaking and you see little sparks on the inside as gears are starting to connect where they’re not supposed to and grind against each other. That finish Fjord's turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can he back up again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five feet or ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more and it’ll take an attack of opportunity. Up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If he does an attack of opportunity, if I move Fjord back, than we get a Sentinel strike, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, if he takes it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it! Sorry, Fjord. He hasn't taken any damage, step back. He still has Armor of Agathys, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Step all the way back. Might as well, because you can always run back there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's as far as he can go, movement speed-wise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he can move farther than that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's not going to take an attack of opportunity. It's currently focused on everything else around it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Fjord's turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This entity is going to attempt to shift back this way. Which means Beau and Molly both get attacks of opportunity against it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not, because it's still in melee with you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you get to try and make it not move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do. Do I still get advantage because flank?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it's moved out of that range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, that's a 17 plus seven, so 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits, so roll damage. It does not move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's an eight on an eight. Plus four, so 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 reduced to six, got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he does not move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, he gets stuck there. The bane of all GMs everywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't still get to take my attack of opportunity, even though that happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he did not technically move out of-- it's sticky. It's one of those weird things where he doesn't technically move beyond the range, but he tries to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He tried to and I try to make a jab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you have it, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take no advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought I might be flanked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no. You would need something right there in that corner to flank.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a (counting) 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It angrily is going to open to do its shrapnel blast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Where? Oh no, Caleb, you're in that cone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, Caleb!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, he's dead already!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god! How long has he been like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was that powerful! I need Molly, Beau, Fjord, and Caleb, and technically Jester, as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Isn't she behind the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She didn't close the door there. She stepped into the space to maintain eye contact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, you have to make a dex save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex save, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a failure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How? You're pinned to a wall!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex save? 22 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success. Oh, you're not there. Nott?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spun myself like a pinwheel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord and Jester, if you could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marisha, do one for Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck Fjord, Gil! Oh, good. 17 for Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten for Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Jester. 27 points of piercing damage, halved to be 13 points of piercing damage to everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not, so you take the full 27 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so 14 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had 27 hit points left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No shit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You’re unconscious?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau’s unconscious again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about you, Cay? Cay-Cay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Low.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Low, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And still pinned. Jester took a full 27.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's she?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jester took a full 27?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She rolled low for her dexterity check. 27 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that the whole, or did you not do the whole thing? I'm up. I'm fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, I need you to make another concentration check, please, from the damage you took.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On what? Nothing's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought your other cat hand?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That failed last time, didn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It failed, but can you still try it for every turn after, or is it a one-time cast thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can use a strength save to break out of it and it exists, but if I fail my concentration check, it goes, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you've recast it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The second time it succeeded immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but when you create it in space, it stays there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It stays there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and then as an action you can cause it to try and do things--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great! Then that means it's staying there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a concentration check to see if you maintain the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Higher than a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you succeed. You maintain concentration. That finishes your turn. Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do that thing you do, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll a death saving throw? That is the thing I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to roll. You take damage from proximity to it, so you automatically fail a death saving throw from the blades carving into your now-unconscious body nearby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I roll again? Can I take the roll I just used?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, whatever you rolled on your death saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Nott and Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to go first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got any thoughts?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I don't have much. I'll walk up there, poke around the corner, shoot a crossbow bolt, do my thing. That's a big hit. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do. Roll damage with sneak attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should have brought more tar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten, halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of piercing damage on the first strike. Do you want to bonus action attack as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess? These attacks are so weak. I don't know what else to do. I don't have anything else to do. Yeah, I guess I'll shoot another one. Why not? That hits, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Go ahead. That's 1d6 plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's another six points, halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved to three, all righty. Sparks are flying. It's starting to shake. Molly, top of your turn, the swirling blades spin around and you take eight points of slashing damage. It's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) Eight points of slashing damage. Oof, that's rough. I'm going to take two swipes at-- I'm going to try and move. I'm going to try and move somewhere where I'm flanking. Is there any flanking available at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, for you, if you move over Beau's body. It's a tough call. I mean, I'll let you do it, if you want to. You'll have to be standing over her unconscious body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, is it in any way that going to give her a little cover, at the very least?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll move in and then move around-- well, no, goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a couple shots and see how this goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Take those shots, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I can use some hits that are all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take those shots, Mollymauk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's what we're doing. First hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't throw away your shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not throwing away my shot. That's a 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get that first thing. That's 12 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage, all righty. Next strike?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next strike. That definitely hit. That's 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, roll damage on this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) That's ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage. How do you want to do this? The blades are spinning, grinding around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got that one really soft blade and I'm rolling it, and I want to see that one little opening and I want it to bend. The sword bends and does that Chinese martial art thing where it goes and pops all the way into the center of it, and I go wrist deep into the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The edges of the armor scrape against your flesh, pushing and cutting past skin, causing blood to drip down your arm, but this is a natural state for you. As the arm pushes into the center, there's a flash of blue light, and the interior of its armored shell (electricity crackling). It's like a glow on the inside of a cracked, dark orb, as all the individual sections where the plate armors meet suddenly glow with a bright, vibrant blue-white light, and then go dark, and the whole metal object hits the ground. All the legs go limp, and it rolls a little bit to one side, now inert and no longer functioning as a construct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a Chow Yun-Fat moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a new die, baby. Does it look familiar, motherfucker?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it the Snitch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the nega-Snitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The nega-Snitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did you get that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I found the place where the Snitch came from. I had the woman make me one out of iron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boom, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see how it fares.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been middly, but it's done okay today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ecks versus Sever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gil has been a help today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You all take a moment. Beau is bleeding out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no, we're immediately going to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester runs up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jester runs up and casts Cure Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have a Cure Wounds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we got 1st-level Lay on Hands to get her up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At 1st-level, because I feel like that's what she would do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess unconscious thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did so well. No, really. You did some good stuff in there. You kept it sitting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you please come cast Pull This Lamppost Out of My Stomach?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yes, yes. I go over and I-- here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was about two inches from the side of your body and thrust through your abdomen. You begin to bleed, but Jester comes over and helps close up that wound before you bleed out too much further.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run back and see what was back over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I want to take a look in the other room too, and give them a proper look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing into the chamber, that is another closed gate that is bent inward from the repeated slamming of this centurion trying to make its way in. Looking past the inside, you see four decomposed bodies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I open the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an attempt to do so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam, you get ten hit points, and you get 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who gets what now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From Jester?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't encountered something quite so heavily fortified as these cells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, I need you to come open this door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk over to the door and start beating it with a sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a strength check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't dex cut this thing? You can't pop it in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have to force it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, I need you to come kick in this door.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If this big thing couldn't kick it in, how could I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're bigger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not budging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're bigger in spirit and heart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'll come and try to open the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go over, see where Molly has failed, and you go and try to fill that void. Make a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe in you. Oh, wait!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, go ahead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not going to budge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use this, Matt. I'm going to try to bend fate and try to repick the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's a little late, but I'll allow it, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why not? Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, okay. As Yasha comes forward and slams her foot into it, it jostles the lock just enough for you to slip past the tumblers, and with a (creaks) it opens a few inches on the inside. The bottom of it is scraping against the stonework, the way it's been bashed and bent has actually forced it out of the frame of the door, and it's going to take a bit more force to push it open enough to move inside, but you manage to do so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The three of us will get that door open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb stops mid-somatic gesture and says, "Ah, fuck this," and goes back to the first door and has a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Beau is going to deliriously-- still really messed up, like a drunk person doing a pointless task-- is going to try and scoop up some ball bearings that she threw, and then after maybe she picks up like ten--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eins, zwei, drei, vier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many ball bearings did you throw out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tossed my baggie--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your entire bag?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My pouch. And did one of these things. So I'm going to get my pouch back, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get your pouch back and you manage to scoop up-- you have, we'll say, 814 ball bearings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Most of which because it's such a ridiculous item.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then after I, deliriously tired of scooping up ball bearings, I'm going to stumble back and collapse next to Caleb and also take a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: May I go over and see the room where this thing was staying in, on the other side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, so you make your way to the opposite end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything near the bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find-- at first you think it's dried compost, but you eventually realize, no, it's just very old human excrement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point we'll cast Detect Magic--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You found prison poop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Old prison poop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Yasha, you head off to the other side where the gate is open, and as you go inside, you can see the interior of this chamber is as scraped up as the rest of them from where this sentry was attempting to scan and break out. On the inside-- make an investigation check? First time for you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it is. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has torn apart their bedding and their bodies, but beyond that, nothing else of interest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back at the front gate, leaning against Beauregard: Eh, what is that? Is that your blood-- or is that mine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slurring) I don't know, it might be yours. It's hard to tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord pats you on the shoulder next to you and goes, "Hey, I just wanted to let you know, I "appreciate what you did, taking the brunt of it, because it didn't even hurt me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slurring) That's very true. I'm going to remember that next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And that's because of you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slurring) You're the best, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know." All righty, so what else are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we retrieve the magic core or anything as proof of what we did here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, the fact that we're going to leave the door open and it's not coming up, but yeah, we'll go get the core and I figure we're going to do a thorough investigation of the whole thing once Caleb can do a Detect Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now that the machine is open, there's not tension holding it together, and you see that each of these armored plates, on the inside, are attached to its own arm-like pole. Once it collapsed, all the armor plates went limp and fell open. It's a tension-held bit of armor, that it could expand and push out different areas to leave openings and then retract again. It's a pretty ingenious design, and you can see why Tinkertop is a talented man, though flawed sometimes in his designs. This is pretty revolutionary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a weaponized version of one of those balls that you throw up in the air and it turns inside out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking inside, it's hundreds of these little poles, and gears, and little servos, and a lot of them are ground, bent, and damaged from the impact that you left inside. There in the center, you see a cracked open, and partially destroyed, bluish crystal sphere. That was where your final blow impacted to destroy it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep cutting off the arms so we can get to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's yanking and bending pieces, pulling them out and (pinging). On the inside, with the damage you've done, it's not too hard to pry a few off, but you manage to get to it, and there is the cracked and shattered crystal core.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Couple questions. I really like some of the armor pieces that he has on his shoulders, like with the skulls and things. Is that just part of his--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've been very busy, didn't have time to make an entire mini of a tiny spherical metal ball covered in blades.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What could you have possibly have been doing, Matt? Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, no. It's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your mustache is traveling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wherever it stays. Well, let's take this stuff back up to the warden?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've had a short rest, and we'll do a quick search. Can you do a Detect Magic spell, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have a little bit left in me, Mollymauk. Will you help me up, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah come on, that's all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he's my pillow! Fuck you, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go fuck yourself, Beau. Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (grunting) Okay. Point me at the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do a scan of Detect Magic through the room over the next 15 minutes or so. You do a thorough pass around. Nothing magical catches your attention. Most of the interior here is-- Actually, no, that's not true. Very faint magical auras from two ember light torches that are on the wall. That faint red light that you've seen is essentially a very low light Everburning torch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn to Mollymauk and say: Yeah, the only thing magical here is you, friend. Pat pat on the cheek. I wander back over to Beauregard, and I go to sleep again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, come on, we're going to get you guys out of here. (strained) We're going to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pick yourselves up, and make your way back to the heavy metal door. On this side, you can see the heavy scraping across it as this ball has also been pushing repeatedly into this one exit point. As you approach, it is still closed and presumably locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (knocking) We're done. Let us out. Guards!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear some shifting behind it, and eventually hear the familiar grinding of chains against metal. (creaking) It opens slightly and the guards peer out. "You alive?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hold up the glowing crystal. You should see the other one. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come on, follow me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beauregard goes: I just-- it took a lot out of us. I pass out in Yasha's arms.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I buy this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to carry me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fireman carries you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to have an insight versus deception check on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you roll really poorly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As I'm holding her--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled way better.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: --I will cast Healing Hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Regain number of hit points equal to your level. So you gain an extra five hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You make me feel so warm inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on, Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A whole five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On our way out, do I see my bolt anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check as you glance around the space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's a small space, you do manage to recover it, so you get one bolt back. It did not trigger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It only triggers if it hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it hits an intended target, possibly, or something hard enough. You rolled low enough where it didn't seem to truly impact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a Fu-Manchu check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys slowly make your way, guided back by the various guards of the Gearhold Prison, to the office of the Wardenhelm, where both Rissa and her father are waiting. As they walk in, you glance over and can see Cleff. He’s like, "So how'd it go? Any luck with the thing? Oh, you "broke it!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did. We may need that later, sadly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm simultaneously impressed and kind of sad, but impressed mostly."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It did work us over quite well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was an incredible device.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It really was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could have told us the eye had a protective windshield wiper device.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's more for when it's raining. I didn't think it would be for tar, but good to know." He takes out the note in his little pad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take the crystal back. I'm so sorry, we may need this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is very good. I am impressed. What is your "names, if I might be of curious?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Mighty Nein. All right. Good to know that The Mighty Nein can be relied upon in such "situations. Are you staying in town for quite a while?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how long we might be staying in town, so maybe we should go ahead and talk about that deal while we're here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. While you were down there, I got approval for about 200 gold from the Starosta for "payment. I hope that is enough?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To get out the Schusters?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't know about the Schusters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. But you talked about getting people out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we mentioned vaguely that we might want something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am curious as to what you are referring to."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have some friends that are currently interred here for financial troubles? Nothing dangerous, nothing violent. We were wondering if we could make a deal for maybe some leniency. If that's possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take that 200 gold, consider it their bail and time served.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, we do have a bit of the mechanism, and if everybody here is all right, I am of the opinion that if anybody asks us, it was your brilliant idea to let us into that cell in the first place to take care of this problem. If anybody asks, we know who is absolutely responsible for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You picked us specifically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Poppin Drokrusher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You saw something in us. You took a chance, and we're grateful for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And this guy will agree to that. Right, Cleff? I elbow Cleff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Of course, great deal. Ooh, sternum, it's a bit pain--" Go ahead and make a persuasion check with advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, come on, man. For fuck's sake. That's a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have any persuasion. I don't know why--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why you keep leading these social encounters?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somebody should pick up, but we don't have our talker here right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you got a talker, but that's okay. He takes a keen look at you, goes over, and starts thumbing through papers. Goes through his books, picks one, and goes, "Schuster, Schuster, "Schuster. All right, I found the report here." He turns the page, "That looks like they were "arrested for false idol worship. That is not a minor offense."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at it this way: one path we could take is that you are the mastermind who hired the right people for the job and everything is perfect. The other path, we talk about how we came in and fixed things you could not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the 200 that were offered, that would put you "at a 150 bail amount should you wish to indeed pay for these very important friends of yours."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, considering you have a hunk of metal down in your basement that is worth at least 100 gold worth of scrap that I'm sure the Assembly Yard would love to have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And they will, because it's still technically commissioned originally by the prison, "so we own the rights to its carcass. However, the moment of negotiation is over. This is my price as "it stands. Either you receive the 200 and walk away, or you can continue to pay the bail and they "will be released. That is up to you--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, I think that’s a fair deal. Jester, would you mind settling this debt for us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 150 gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 150 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Laura, you can text right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. Laura will text if she has a problem with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord can foot half, since he's sympathetic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fjord will pay half! So 75 gold each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: MARISHA; Fjord says, "You know what? To keep them out of that orphanage?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your gold, Laura, or your maternal bond. You choose!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven. Okay. So that's all right. Bump bump. Oh, and look at that! It's all done! Look at that, it's all done. That all happened!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that. It's beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's like, "No money was spent!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's as if it never was!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What a bunch of assholes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, he--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kids are expensive!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kids are a deep financial drain, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, don't I know it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are on the second level in cell 12B. They have had their bail paid." The halfling rushes off, some of the guards leave with her, and about 20 or so minutes later you hear the footsteps return and there you see this couple. They pull forward, dirty, sallow, not very well-fed, but alive, and they both look bewildered. The man, who's got a thick graying brown scruff and the hair a bit shaken from his form, he glances up at the rest of you. "I don't understand what's happening."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We never understand what's happening, either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gilda? Wallace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman looks over. She has this long, curled, and tangled brownish-red hair. She goes, "Is this true? We're free?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we get outside and then we'll talk?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you guide the now no-longer-prisoners outside of the Gearhold Prison, and as the small door opens to lead them out into the late afternoon air, the sunlight hits them. And you see them blink and wince, and then look up and smile, as this is probably the first sunlight they've seen in six months. You can see a bit of glimmer as tears begin to form at the edge of their eyes and the two, the couple, look at each other and smile, and hold each other, and look back at the group of you and say, "Thank you, but why?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's just say your kids made an impression on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are they all right? Where are they?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're at your house, the butcher place? Don't worry, we'll take you there. They're being kept safe by a tiny bird with a dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at you, and look both frightened by the words you say, and then equally frightened by the creature they now realize that is saying it, and go, "Right, right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Best not to think about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes the people that help you are the least expected.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say eclectic, but sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank heavens for little blessings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you very much. Can we go to our children, please?"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you guys all make your way back up the switchback path to the Idleworks Shelf, just as the sun begins to hit the mountains, the skies turning to the oranges and reds of the coming sunset. At this point, the people of the city begin to rise in energy once more as the whistles of a day's work come to a close. The city beings to liven up once more into an air of celebration, music blasting around you on all sides.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like being in Vegas for more than 24 hours. You're like, "No! Not again! I can't do "this for a third night in a row! Ugh!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll for dubstep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whistling) (knocking)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whistling) (knocking)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's us. Open it up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Austin and Gail look past and open the door. As soon as Gail can say, "You're back--" they look, and you can see their parents, right there, smile back at them. With that, they rush out, Gail and Austin, and wrap their arms around their mother and father. Behind them, skittering, Layla and Jude look past, and they run up as well and hold them. Now this family unit of six all brought together again, as filthy as they may be in their current garb and lifestyle, hold themselves amongst the glowing of distant fireworks going off, an unknowing celebration that the city holds for this family. Behind, you see Kiri shuffle out, see what's happening, then also come forward and put her arms around the family and looks back at you with a smile. (like Jester) "Yes, I am a good girl."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is making me really emotional.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This could be our chance to find a good home for her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri steps away from the group, looks at the rest of you, takes the dagger out, steps forward and goes, (like Nott) "The Mighty Nein!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kiri. (exhales)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You like these kids, Kiri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Caleb) "Ja."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, you spend enough time with us-- Beauregard and I here almost died tonight. You're just a little girl. You should be playing with these kids, not playing with us. What about you, Mom and Dad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, they're barely paying attention. They look back and say, "I'm sorry, what?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a request.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A favor. In return--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In exchange-- Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you were nailing it. We did a jinxies thing, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord steps in next to you as well, and goes, "Look, no children should be without their "parents, and we're happy to have brought you back together. Be more careful. Make sure that if you "do anything that could put your kids at risk, don't." He looks over and defers back to you, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We get into trouble quite a bit. I feel guilty bringing this young girl with us. We've gone to great lengths to get you out and all-- I can't speak for the group, but all I ask is that you give this girl some parents.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord's right. No child should be separated from their parents. Unfortunately, this little one was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The parents look at each other, and down at the kids. The little girl, Layla, with her curled red hair, goes, "Does this mean she can stay?" and looks over at Kiri. Kiri looks between them and you, and looks temporarily conflicted and confused, but you can see a bit of understanding wash over. Kiri reaches over and takes from her pocket the dagger, steps forward, and turns it around, handle forward. Holds it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've learned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music box plays]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's just mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Caleb) "She's a pretty good egg." Looks up at Caleb and rushes forward, and gives a big, warm hug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would mean a lot if you take her, but we'll help you out. I reach in and I give them 50 gold from my stash. Should be enough to help for a little bit. Hopefully make up the difference.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She accepts it, wide-eyed. "I don't know what to say."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I stole 75 gold from my friend without him being here to speak for it, so I feel like it's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps back, and they look like they're in shock still from these strangers that have come to their aid so heavily. Kiri pulls back and looks to you. (like Jester) "Don't eat humans, okay?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go give Jester a hug. I know she wished she'd be here for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you see her arms twisted up and the eyes filled with water and she goes, "Oh! We're "going to come back, right?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we'll come back and check on Kiri. Be a good girl, Kiri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives a big hug and goes, "Kiri, you're going to be so beautiful as you grow up, and this "family is going to take care of you and is going to be your new mother and father and you’ll have "this whole family here for you. Remember that no matter what's happening and what you are doing, "the Traveler is always looking over you, and we are always-- always thinking of you with love." Jester turns around, and you can see the tears welling up in her eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give Jester a hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes you in there. Fjord steps forward and ruffles the feathers on the head and says, "You're always a member. Maybe one day, you'll be able to come back and use that dagger for something that's alive." Kiri turns back and looks to you. (like Nott) "Yeza was his name."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess everyone knows at this point, so it's okay now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a hug.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for listening to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to Molly and gives this distant stare.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take care of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Molly) "Take care of them." Looks to you, and comes up and cuddles up against your chest where she had slept the night before and (chirping).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scratch those feathers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The feathers fluff up a bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Goodbye, Kiri. We will send you treasures from all of our travels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Okay."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We will miss you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The family looks out and goes, "If there's ever "the opportunity to pay this back or forward, we will. Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You already are. Look at this handsome lot. You look like you need to be a vinyl decal on the back of a minivan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not even going to go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "I am Kiri." The door closes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That felt really good, guys!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It sure did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's nice being good people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That might be the first nice thing I've ever done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Explains why your face is doing that, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a good look on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It probably isn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on, let's go find a quiet place to sleep. I'm exhausted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, as you're walking along back to your inn, goes, "Now, I know y'all did this because I "asked you to, and you weren't sure if you wanted to. I want you to know that's appreciated. You "went out on a limb for me and these kids. I'll remember that. Anyway, come on." As you guys make your way back to a more solemn evening, the celebration is wild. The Blushing Tankard Tavern is in the same crazy energy and music you possibly can expect, but you are too exhausted emotionally and physically. You get a drink, find your way back to your room, and crash out hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Long rest to you all. The next morning you come to consciousness, your first morning not hungover for a lot of you, here in the city of Hupperdook. Now the city is yours to make your final business with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can do more things in this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you haven't gotten back to Tinkertop for your half of the deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that's right. I guess we should go visit Cleff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get your tinker toy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, mine's a little busted, though, so it would be nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hold it up, it goes (snapping).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can fix that. Probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to take it away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the way, I look for someone who wasn't the guy who hated us before selling more of those poppers, because I want to stock up before we get out of this godforsaken town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tag along with Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You get another set of ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another set of ten. Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it was two copper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will only stop if there's something interesting in a window. Otherwise, I figure we're heading back to pick up the crossbow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That felt pretty good last night. Helping somebody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do something good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it wasn't too bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get the sense that you have bigger plans than that, even. Cobalt. Monk. I get a sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, I don't really have a lot of plans. My entire life has been plans being made for me. So it's nice not having plans. I ran away from the Cobalt Soul. I have ideas. I don't know if ideas would count as plans.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's just semantics. I have a feel about you. You and change. I don't think that you and I have the same plans, but I think they might overlap. I would be willing to help you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd be willing to help you, under one condition. Can we agree to keep each other straight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If either one of us tries to turn and do something stupid, or lean a little bit more evil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evil?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chaotic, whatever you want to call it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Surely neither of us are evil, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anarchists? Let's just make a pact if either one of us do anything stupid that maybe we're each other's failsafes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not true. I do want to hurt people, just not people I like. Let's hurt bad guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I can help you. I think you can help me. I think we can do some good here.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Skype high-five!

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: Skype-five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Skype force five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do the-- give me a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will do my best, Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing. Awesome. As that's happening, you guys have reached the exterior of the Tinkertop Inventions shop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there was possible to buy some food, I want to have some camping food for the rest, like good stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: High-quality provisions for the rest of the trip?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, just really good food.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stews.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some meat, veggies. Just (grunts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you drop a solid two gold--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have good road meals that'll last--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're eating good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, for the whole group? For the whole group, put five gold down and I'd say you guys have some of the finest fucking food you could have on the road going north. That is good eating.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. We're going to be eating really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the outskirts of the Tinkertop Inventions shack, you make your way on the inside and you see, in the process of feverishly sketching out designs, Cleff Tinkertop barely look up from his page. "Oh! Hello, good to see you all again. Thank you. Thank you for helping with that. I think, "based on some of these new designs I'm coming forward, they might be interested in a new "version! Perhaps a new design! Perhaps an update, if you will, based on the notes you gave me, so "here's to hoping!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Worth a shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't know if a lesson was learned here, but all right, let's continue on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe the lesson was for us. I'm not sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I help you with anything?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we just came to say goodbye; we're probably rolling out of town soon. And, you know, I mean, if you had an extra crossbow lying around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ha ha! Right, sorry, I forgot entirely! I'll be right back." He goes back and rummages and pulls out the fantastic, previously displayed Tinkertop Boltblaster 1000 and goes, "Thank you "for your help. I hope it serves you well. By the way, if there's any problems, if you wouldn't mind "making notes, and feel free to mail them off to me so I can perhaps improve on the next iteration."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A beta testing sort of a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't mind. That'd be fantastic."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm, mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yes. Ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That can happen. That's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love it. It's great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very you. It's very you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you, Cleff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, and thank you as well. Wherever you're off to, safe travels!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cleff, maybe if in the future we come back and need a repair or something spiffy, you'll cut us a deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think something can be arranged. I'll be here!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And hey, I don't know if you know the Schusters at all, but if you see a family walking around, little bird child, maybe watch over them for us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a very curious series of words you've strung together, but I'll keep an eye out for you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I acknowledge that, and thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or at least a bird person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck you, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if you're leaving, you should say bye, Rissa!" Behind him, Rissa sits up with her goggles on. She was in the back currently working on something. Goes, "Oh, right, you're off "already? You're leaving?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got to get on the road.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, it's been fun."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't thank you enough. We'll definitely come back in contact next time we're rolling through town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do. Thank you for showing me a good time and for getting this old coot back to some sort of "interesting means of constructive work."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure he's going to invent many new, excellent devices.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We leave her the drinking tokens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "Well, I mean, drinking by proxy, I'll certainly take that!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They need use. I think it's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. Next time, I'll owe you a round."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very much taking you up on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, be safe. Take care. And 'til the next time." As you guys exit, you hear her say, "I "don't think this design's going to work, Dad." He says, "No, trust me!" And the door closes behind you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's going to end well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think they're on the road to recovery.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something very positive's going to come out of that relationship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not thinking about leaving us again, are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why would you think that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you tend to go mum for a while, and then you're gone. You’re very useful for us! We could do great things together, the not-nine of us. I hope you're not thinking of leaving.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes things need to be done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, my muscles are big. They can accomplish a lot, but we do better with you around.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Caleb. I think you can manage just fine, but I will-- I'm here for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not going anywhere! What are you, crazy, Caleb? She's fine! Come on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was just a feeling I had.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're crazy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What a strange feeling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point-- well, no, you slept through the night and you've woken up the next morning, so it's pushing close to midday.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get on our way soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. To Shitty Creek?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make our way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that where we're going next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord musters the cart, the horses, retrieves them from where they were stored during your stay here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we making our way out of town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like it, unless you guys have anything else planned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the way out of town-- you said when we came into town there were some guards with pistols, with guns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we see any on the way out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, as you make your way through the bottom end of the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Glancing through, there are two crownsguard that walk by, both gnomish. One of them appears to be carrying a heavy sword on the back. The other one does have some sort of strange contraption, like a firearm pistol at its side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to steal it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With either Mage Hand, or my own hand, whatever's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mage Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I doing? Sleight of hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleight of hand, so your proficiency modifier plus your dex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. 19, then. So not sleight of hand, this is a dexterity check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, sleight of hand is-- I'm sorry, no, it's a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well then it's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, yeah. My brain. I was thinking of unlocking. It glides past over you. The guard’s none the wiser.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is loaded with a single shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have a single-shot pistol with no ammunition.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's loaded with a bullet, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, cool. Great. That's all I care about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. With that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you're deserted on an island, to kill yourself with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In those final dark moments! This campaign goes really dark suddenly! With that, you guys head out past the fences, the artillery construction ranges, the plumes of smoke and steam, the dual-shelved levels of the gnomish city of Hupperdook, with the people, adventures that you met and left behind, and forge your way on further up the Crispvale Roadway heading towards the Glory Run Road, that heads north, towards Nogvurot and the Shadycreek Run. Heading on for the next better half of the day, you make a fair amount of travel, before the sun eventually sets before you can reach the crossroads. Eventually having to pull off to the side of the road to make camp for the first night there. You head off your general curious range there, you set up a small camp. Who's taking first watch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott and I.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Nott and Caleb, if you wouldn't mind rolling a perception check with advantage, or both of you roll it individually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he rolled, and now you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got a nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got-- okay. Here comes. Oh, big eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing. Though you're not paying much attention, nothing seems to transpire during that first watch period. You finish it without issue. The second watch come up. Fjord goes ahead and says, "I'll take it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll join you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'll join as well, Yasha?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord and Yasha are currently situated there. Two of you are up. It's now pushing past maybe one or two in the morning. The fire is burned low to embers at this point, and you're both staying close for heat. Fjord's sitting there looking, and goes, "I'm kind of proud of all this, you know?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am, too. I'm actually very surprised at the choices we've made. Especially the choices that I've made.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. A lot of these folks have surprised me." A little voice goes like, (as Jester) "Some "people are trying to sleep."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I’m awake now." Fjord goes like, "Let’s take a walk." Fjord stands up, Jester stands up, and the three of you step away for a minute. Fjord looks up at the stars and goes, "Dreams’ve been "weird. For all the visions, the darkness out there, it’s good to know that, somehow maybe we're "all putting a little bit of light in there too."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That’s a very nice way to put it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could show you some of my hometown. Maybe some of yours, but maybe not quite as well put together." Jester interjects at this point and goes, "Well, if we do go back, I could show you-- if it is safe "depending on what my mom says-- the places where I grew up, the beautiful shorelines. Have you been "to the Menagerie Coast before?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: "I’ve never been to the Coast."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it is so beautiful. It would be incredible."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I’ve seen--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four other dark figures emerge from the shadows around and grab and immediately put their arms around you. You try and resist from the spell. In fact, make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord maintains it, but all this in absolute silence. There is no sound, just shadows and starlight. As you’re now being grappled by two men, the spell breaks from you. However, they’re still holding you. As you feel a gag pulled over your mouth from one of them, the other one begins to throw rope around you. You’re looking over the side and you can see another gag showed into Fjord’s mouth. Manacles are being shoved onto his arms and legs. He's unable to move. Jester tries to break free off the opposite-- not with a natural seven. She’s kicking and screaming, but there is no sound coming out and as she’s pushed down, another figure comes up and throws shackles onto her arms behind her and her legs. She’s yelling and yelling and a gag is pulled over her mouth. What are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There’s two people that are now coming to grapple you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take out my weapon and I’m ready to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You pull your weapon. Make an attack, if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. Okay. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits. Roll damage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where was this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She’s a bad motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 damage. Oof! You have a second attack, if you like.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that’s a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics or acrobatics check to try and not be grappled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That’s not going to make it. He grapples and holds you in place. The other one takes and slams manacles onto your wrists and pulls it back, wrenching the blade from your grasp. Your arms are now locked behind you into these metal manacles.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try to scream out in some way to the Stormlord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and scream. Make a straight wisdom check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that moment, as you try and scream out, your vocal cords strained by the sheer force of your voice, no sound comes out. Looking up in the sky, there isn’t a single cloud in sight. Probably for the first time in weeks, since you’ve been in this side of Wildemount, it is a clear night. No sign of clouds. No sign of storm. In that moment, as you’re screaming out, the gag gets put into your mouth and tied behind your head. You glance over and you can see Jester being dragged. Now the manacles affixed to the back of her ankles and she’s being pulled through the grass, Fjord a few feet behind her. Still unable to really make out the shapes of these hooded figures that are pulling them through and you are shoved to the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are my legs still free?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your ankles are about to be manacled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I kick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, all righty. With that, you manage to kick free and they can’t quite get ahold on it and one figure steps forward, shorter than the others, stout looking, and goes, "Oh for the--" and his voice dissipates as he gets closer. I need you to make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll one more athletics check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a voice speak up and say, "Hey, look what "we found, eh?" You see a dark figure step closer to you. Glancing up, through the minimal light, a human man, tall and brutish. His head is completely bald on top, revealing a scarred and tattooed design across one side that curls down into his lightly leathered armored chest. His thick brow hangs over two cold, uncaring eyes. He nods in approval to these three acquisitions that you are, revealing a number of golden teeth between his cracked lips. His muscular body is mostly obscured by a cloak and hood beyond that armor. The thug goes, "Lorenzo, your instincts are "sharp. Looks like we found ourselves a sudden bounty." The heavy figure, who hasn’t spoken at this point, kneels down and grabs the chins of each of you. Grabs Jester, who is now shaking, with anger and fear in her eyes, looks both sides of her face, goes to Fjord and lifts the chin, comes to you and grabs--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I spit in his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was she taken and Fjord and Jester?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The three of them, yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All in the same cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My heart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We heard it with our passive perception.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were in a Silence spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I forgot to tell you that I never went to sleep and I was watching the whole time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Better be some dope investigating at the top when we come back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe you hit him enough so that you left a clue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It’s possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well yeah, blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were some struggle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blood! Splatter! Some CSI shit! Up in here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We’re going to name it Caruso.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we’ll have dope one-liners.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Who. It’s going to be great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, what a foursome. Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It’s going to be interesting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This was too much! Kiri and then this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did the right thing with Kiri.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My heart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn’t kill Fjord and Jester, though! By puppeting them. We took some money, but that’s a good cost for not killing them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did drain Laura’s coffers, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just a little.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, it’s not like the money would do her any good right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That 75 gold?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They’re going to take all of that, so if anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she didn’t take her haversack with her when she parted with you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we have the haversack. And if they get disarmed--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really, it’s our money now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take that up with Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I’m going to have access to this haversack for a while, I’m just saying. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy. I’m going to get in trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you, Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god! No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes back to New York. You’ll hop in when you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I’ll hop in when I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she doesn’t! Is that true?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You’re leaving?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He knows that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don’t go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay here! And play D&D for weeks and years at the old folks’ home.

lines.name: MATT, ASHLEY
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We’re just selfish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But Skyping isn’t the same, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I feel like I’m in a bunker underneath the ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sound like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There’s just a half a second of delay and that’s all it takes to make feel like I’m 80 feet away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It’s a little much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I be Terence Stamp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It’s true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Liam, for making it.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Liam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Matt for making this game work with half of a crew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --Baryshnikov of Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Congrats to Laura and Travis!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, the dads get to laugh now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The first night is rough!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just you wait, Travis Willingham! The chickens are all coming home to roost!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: MARISHA; I know! These fucking assholes are like, "One of us! When are you going to join our "misery?!" And I'm like, "No!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not misery.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sleep is all gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not misery. It's beautiful and amazing and incredible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: TALIESIN; It's been a very long day!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The day's not over!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For me, at least!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. That's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) The life of the actor! But yes, we'll have announcements soon on that. In the meantime, guys, thank you so much for coming with us. We love you, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
